title: Andy Samberg As RFK Jr.’s Central Park Bear Stars in John Mulaney’s SNL Musical Sketch
description: Pete Davidson also made a surprise cameo in the musical number. Andy Samberg As RFK Jr.’s Central Park Bear Stars in John Mulaney’s SNL Musical Sketch Alex Young
author: Alex Young
excerpt: John Mulaney's latest Saturday Night Live musical number featured a surprise appearance from Pete Davidson and Andy Samberg dressed up as RFK Jr.'s dead bear.
text: John Mulaney hosted Saturday Night Live for a sixth time this weekend, and, as per tradition, the episode featured an elaborate, musical-themed number involving most of the cast and even a couple celebrity cameos. This go-around, the sketch involved returning SNL cast member Pete Davidson attempting to purchase a gallon of milk from a Port Authority Duane Reed managed by Mulaney, leading to a humorous musical number about the origin of said milk set to the tune of The Lion King theme. Other musical numbers included Marcello Hernandez playing a shampoo bottle under lock and key; Chloe Fineman leading Timothée Chalamet lookalikes in song; and Andy Samberg dressed as the carcass of the bear dumped by Robert F. Kennedy Jr. in Central Park, singing in the style of Hamilton. Elsewhere on last night’s Saturday Night Live, musical guest Chappelle Roan debuted a Lesbian country song called “The Giver,” and Vice President Kamala Harris made a surprise appearance during the cold open.
html:
John Mulaney hosted Saturday Night Live for a sixth time this weekend, and, as per tradition, the episode featured an elaborate, musical-themed number involving most of the cast and even a couple celebrity cameos. This go-around, the sketch involved returning SNL cast member Pete Davidson attempting to purchase a gallon of milk from a Port Authority Duane Reed managed by Mulaney, leading to a humorous musical number about the origin of said milk set to the tune of The Lion King theme.

Other musical numbers included Marcello Hernandez playing a shampoo bottle under lock and key; Chloe Fineman leading Timothée Chalamet lookalikes in song; and Andy Samberg dressed as the carcass of the bear dumped by Robert F. Kennedy Jr. in Central Park, singing in the style of Hamilton.

Elsewhere on last night’s Saturday Night Live, musical guest Chappelle Roan debuted a Lesbian country song called “The Giver,” and Vice President Kamala Harris made a surprise appearance during the cold open.
